headline: Apollo Global’s (APO) Funds to Acquire Major U.S. Hydropower Platform; BMO Starts Coverage at “Market Perform”
summary: Third Point Management holds $180,884,250 worth of Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) shares, representing 2.37% of its portfolio.
